item.title: Reply to 'submitting dynamically created form with javascript' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2053970/submitting-dynamically-created-form-with-javascript:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to 'submitting dynamically created form with javascript' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2053970/submitting-dynamically-created-form-with-javascript:

It’s been a while, but I think browser security settings normally will not allow you to set the contents of <input type="file” /> programmatically, resulting in some security exception when you submit.
